API â€‹

Attributes â€‹

NameDescriptionTypeDefault
typetype^[enum]'primary' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'danger' | 'info' | 'default'default
underlinewhether the component has underline^[boolean]true
disabledwhether the component is disabled^[boolean]false
hrefsame as native hyperlink's href^[string]â€”
iconicon component^[string] / ^[Component]â€”

Slots â€‹

NameDescription
defaultcustomize default content
iconcustomize icon component
